Articles.Content:
The RasTech VC-10.

Based on the 1960's classic this version can seat up to 64 Kerbals. [http://kerbalx.com/erasmusguy/RasTech-VC-10](http://kerbalx.com/erasmusguy/RasTech-VC-10)

![ABpKAmC.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/ABpKAmC.png?1)

![kqmESSG.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/kqmESSG.png?1)

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
Very nice, another iconic british plane captured in ksp, still holds the fastest sub-sonic flight across the Atlantic doesnt it?
Thank you. Supposedly it does hold the record but don't look to hard because there isn't much proof!
